summary: On Halloween night, two precocious little girls try to save their parents from their nasty old capitalist aunt's greedy clutches. Magic abounds and they meet mysterious new friends along the way.
cast: Mary-Kate Olsen|Ashley Olsen|Cloris Leachman|Phil Fondacaro|Eric McCormack|Kelli Fox|Wayne Robson|Matthew Walker|Meshach Taylor|Denalda Williams|Gary Jones|Babs Chula|Bill Meilen|Nora McLellan|Alex Green|Alex Diakun|Claire Caplan|Karin Konoval|Glynis Leyshon|Mitchell Kosterman|Gerry McAteer|Eliza Centenara|Christopher Anderson|Lynda Boyd|Ian Bagg|Freda Perry
title: Abracadabra
